front.title: A guide to United States furniture compliance requirements

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This guide addresses children's furniture, upholstered furniture and other types of furniture. This document does NOT address mattresses or other home furnishings such as carpets and rugs.

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
